summary: This module supplies a shared Proxy class that encapsulates the common logic for preparing, loading, and cleaning up temporary Nginx configuration files used in Certbot compatibility tests. It offers methods to copy configuration snippets, validate Nginx syntax, and remove test artifacts, serving as a foundation for more specific Nginx test configurators. The file also contains a few placeholder helper functions for extracting configuration details, which are currently unused.
business_intent: To provide a reusable, consistent infrastructure for Nginxâ€‘based test scenarios in the Certbot compatibility test suite, enabling reliable setup and teardown of Nginx environments so that Certbot's behavior with Nginx can be validated automatically.
